title: Stillmaker
content:
Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain special Actions while holding it.

The dagger's hoisting blade is designed to nick the flesh as many times as possible, allowing its paralytic poison to flow effortlessly into any unfortunate target.

BG3 Stillmaker Information

1d4+7Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Hold Person (Lvl 3) Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Pommel Strike Lacerate Piercing Strike Dagger Light Finesse Thrown Range: 1.5/2.5/1
